礲字的基本解释

礲
lóng
古同“砻”：“知足以为礲砺，行足以为辅助。”

礲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lóng］
［《廣韻》盧紅切，平東，來。］
［《廣韻》盧貢切，去送，來。］
亦作“礲1”。亦作“鑨1”。“砻1”的繁体字。
(1)磨。
(2)磨石。
(3)脱去稻壳的农具。
(4)用砻脱去稻谷的壳。
(5)紧密。参见“礱密”。
(6)通“壟”。坟墓。参见“礱石”、“礱塚”。

礲字的康熙字典解释
礲字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
礲字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
礲
lóng
Gu Tong "hustle": "Knowing is enough for hard work, and action is enough for assistance."
礲
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lóng］
["Guangyun" Lu Hongqie, Pingdong, come. ]
["Guangyun" Lu Gongqie, go and send, come. ]
Also known as "礲1". Also known as "鑨1". Traditional characters for "砻1".
(1) Grinding.
(2) Grinding stone.
(3) Farm tools with rice husks removed.
(4) Use a hull to remove the husk of the rice.
(5) Close. See "Hulledness".
(6) Through "ridge". grave. See "husked stone", "husked mound".
